item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a software engineer, a Gopher, who loves debugging, enjoys refactoring and admires clean code! I’m also an avid travel, who dabbles in photography from time to time. Feel free to reach out for discussions, proposals or general banter! Twitter: @geekgunda Linkedin: chinmaybhattar Unsplash: @geekgunda
